Heey guyz,

im new on this forum, but im playing KSP a little while, lets say 4 months. i saw some coowl topics here, so i decided to join the forumsss

But, yeah, this is me:

My name is Dennis, im 15 years old and i live in the Netherlands (Holland)

The things i like the most in KSP are: Jebediah, Freaky vehicles that explode before they even get in air, and most of all i like the fact that i can do whatever i want when i want it

I have some basic questions:

How on Kerbal do i ever create a perfect orbit? i have watched several trailers and how to's on Youtube but i just cant figure it out!

How can i get a nice spaceport in space? Because i wont even reach 5k alt. with my current spacecrafts.

If anyone can help me, plss reply

Lovely Greetz: Dennis

Hello, welcome

I think one of the kerbal tutorials explain orbiting well (inside the game - you can reach it from the main menu). The main idea is that you should burn in the direction you are going to incrase the orbit path on the other side of the planet, or you burn exactly the opposite direction you are heading to decrease the orbit path on the other side of the planet.

hmm, 5k alt. is not very high maybe you use jet engines? those need atmosphere to operate. You mean you cant get into space at all? Or you just build a big spacestation, and you cant get it up?
